service.line: ****** ESMA test - Ecole de Spécialités Multimédia d'Abidjan ******
****** ESMA test225- Ecole de Spécialités Multimédia d'Abidjan ******
****** PAIEMENT DE FRAIS DE CONTRIBUTION TONTINE *******
Сумма перевода в валюте внесения: {Payment["originators_amount"]} руб.
Сумма к выплате в валюте выплаты: {Payment["destination_amount"]} {company_currency_code}
Используйте номер Карты My WU при всех последующих переводах Вестерн Юнион!

step.name: ShowInfo
InputInfo
step.option:
DECLARE @xmlData XML DECLARE @t1 TABLE (alias nvarchar(100),service_alias nvarchar(100)) DECLARE @p1 TABLE (alias nvarchar(100),service_alias nvarchar(100)) DECLARE @search_str NVARCHAR(400) SET @search_str='%{searchstr}%' DECLARE @result nvarchar(MAX) SET @xmlData = ( SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET ( BULK 'C:\Terminal\Logic\settings_.xml', SINGLE_BLOB ) AS xmlData )
;WITH XMLNAMESPACES (DEFAULT 'http://ibpsoft.com/Barcodes.xsd') INSERT INTO @t1 (alias, service_alias) SELECT DataPage.Item.value('@alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)'), (SELECT CASE WHEN DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') IS NULL THEN DataPage.Item.value('@alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') ELSE DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') END AS se ) FROM @xmlData.nodes('//menuitem') DataPage ( Item ),[service] svc WHERE DataPage.Item.value('@alias','nvarchar(100)')=svc.alias OR DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias','nvarchar(100)')=svc.alias
;WITH CTE1 (alias) AS ( SELECT srv.alias FROM [service] srv WHERE srv.name_service LIKE @search_str ) INSERT INTO @p1 (alias, service_alias) SELECT DISTINCT cte1.alias AS calias, t1.alias FROM CTE1 cte1 JOIN @t1 t1 ON cte1.alias=t1.service_alias
SELECT @result = COALESCE(@result +', ','') + '{"id":"' + CAST(srv.id_service AS nvarchar) + '","alias":"' + p1.alias + '","DisplayName":"'+REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(srv.name_service, '"',''),'''',''),'@',''),'«',''),'»','') +'","logo":"'+REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(srv.logo, '"',''),'''',''),'@',''),'«',''),'»','') +'","name":"'+p1.service_alias +'"}' FROM [service] srv, @p1 p1 WHERE srv.alias=p1.alias SELECT '['+@result+']' AS sResult

step.name: InputInfo
step.option: Pour effectuer une recherche, entrez le nom du destinataire en entier ou en partie

DECLARE @xmlData XML DECLARE @txtxml nvarchar(MAX) DECLARE @t1 TABLE (alias nvarchar(100),service_alias nvarchar(100)) DECLARE @p1 TABLE (alias nvarchar(100),service_alias nvarchar(100)) DECLARE @search_str NVARCHAR(400) SET @search_str='%{searchstr}%' DECLARE @result nvarchar(MAX) DECLARE @t2 TABLE(row1 nvarchar(max)) INSERT INTO @t2 (row1) SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT _value FROM param_step WHERE _key LIKE 'menudatastring' AND idd_step LIKE 0 ORDER BY id_param_step
SELECT @txtxml = COALESCE(@txtxml+'','')+CAST(row1 as nvarchar(max)) FROM @t2 SET @xmlData=CONVERT(XML,@txtxml)
INSERT INTO @t1 (alias, service_alias) SELECT DataPage.Item.value('@alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)'), (SELECT CASE WHEN DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') IS NULL THEN DataPage.Item.value('@alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') ELSE DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') END AS se ) FROM @xmlData.nodes('//menuitem') DataPage ( Item ),[service] svc WHERE DataPage.Item.value('@alias','nvarchar(100)')=svc.alias OR DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias','nvarchar(100)')=svc.alias ;WITH CTE1 (alias) AS ( SELECT srv.alias FROM [service] srv, extension_objects eobj WHERE (eobj.idd_object=srv.id_service AND eobj._name='searchTags' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN eobj._value = '' THEN LOWER(srv.name_service) ELSE LOWER(eobj._value) END AS rse ) LIKE LOWER(@search_str)
) ) INSERT INTO @p1 (alias, service_alias) SELECT DISTINCT cte1.alias AS calias, t1.alias FROM CTE1 cte1 JOIN @t1 t1 ON cte1.alias=t1.service_alias
SELECT @result = COALESCE(@result +', ','') + '{"id":"' + CAST(srv.id_service AS nvarchar) + '","alias":"' + p1.alias + '","DisplayName":"'+REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(srv.name_service,
'"',''),'''',''),'@',''),'«',''),'»','') +'","logo":"'+REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(srv.logo, '"',''),'''',''),'@',''),'«',''),'»','') +'","name":"'+p1.service_alias
+'"}' FROM [service] srv, @p1 p1 where srv.alias=p1.alias SELECT '['+@result+']' AS sResult

step.name: InputInfo
step.option: Pour effectuer une recherche, entrez le nom du destinataire en entier ou en partie

DECLARE @xmlData XML DECLARE @txtxml nvarchar(MAX) DECLARE @t1 TABLE (alias nvarchar(100),service_alias nvarchar(100)) DECLARE @p1 TABLE (alias nvarchar(100),service_alias nvarchar(100)) DECLARE @search_str NVARCHAR(400) SET @search_str='%{searchstr}%' DECLARE @result nvarchar(MAX) DECLARE @t2 TABLE(row1 nvarchar(max)) INSERT INTO @t2 (row1) SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT _value FROM param_step WHERE _key LIKE 'menudatastring' AND idd_step LIKE 0 ORDER BY id_param_step
SELECT @txtxml = COALESCE(@txtxml+'','')+CAST(row1 as nvarchar(max)) FROM @t2 SET @xmlData=CONVERT(XML,@txtxml)
INSERT INTO @t1 (alias, service_alias) SELECT DataPage.Item.value('@alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)'), (SELECT CASE WHEN DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') IS NULL THEN DataPage.Item.value('@alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') ELSE DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias', 'NVARCHAR(100)') END AS se ) FROM @xmlData.nodes('//menuitem') DataPage ( Item ),[service] svc WHERE DataPage.Item.value('@alias','nvarchar(100)')=svc.alias OR DataPage.Item.value('@service_alias','nvarchar(100)')=svc.alias ;WITH CTE1 (alias) AS ( SELECT srv.alias FROM [service] srv, extension_objects eobj WHERE (eobj.idd_object=srv.id_service AND eobj._name='searchTags' AND (SELECT CASE WHEN eobj._value = '' THEN LOWER(srv.name_service) ELSE LOWER(eobj._value) END AS rse ) LIKE LOWER(@search_str)
) ) INSERT INTO @p1 (alias, service_alias) SELECT DISTINCT cte1.alias AS calias, t1.alias FROM CTE1 cte1 JOIN @t1 t1 ON cte1.alias=t1.service_alias
SELECT @result = COALESCE(@result +', ','') + '{"id":"' + CAST(srv.id_service AS nvarchar) + '","alias":"' + p1.alias + '","DisplayName":"'+REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(srv.name_service,
'"',''),'''',''),'@',''),'«',''),'»','') +'","logo":"'+REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(srv.logo, '"',''),'''',''),'@',''),'«',''),'»','') +'","name":"'+p1.service_alias
+'"}' FROM [service] srv, @p1 p1 where srv.alias=p1.alias SELECT '['+@result+']' AS sResult

lng.InsertedNotToEnd: La carte n'est pas complètement insérée. Insérez aussi loin que possible.
lng.ReadWithdraw: Erreur de lecture. Veuillez retirer la carte.

lng.CarryNotToEnd: carryNotToEnd Карта не вынута. Возьмите карту.
lng.InsertedNotToEnd: insertedNotToEnd Карта вставлена не до упора. Вставьте до упора.
lng.ReadWithdraw: readWithdraw Карта не прочитана. Выньте карту.
lng.Error: cardReaderError Карта не прочитана, возможно не верно вставлена

lng.BanknotaLessMinValue: le montant avec une commission est inférieur au paiement minimum. Déposer une note d'une plus grande valeur
lng.DontHaveBalance: Le billet de banque n'est pas accepté. Pas de changement Donner le bonnot d'une autre dignité.
lng.MaxBalanseFromTotal: Le billet de banque n'est pas accepté. Dépasse le montant de changement tolérable pour ce montant.

lng.WrongCurrency: Валюта купюры отличается от валюты платежа
lng.BanknotaLessMinValue: Купюра с учетом комиссии меньше минимального размера платежа. Внесите купюру большего достоинства.
lng.DontHaveBalance: Банкнота не принята. Нет сдачи. Внесите бонкноту другого достоинства.
lng.MaxBalanseFromTotal: Банкнота не принята. Превышает доспустимый размер сдачи на данную сумму.

lng.cantCheckButCantNext: Проверка номера в данный момент не возможна. Проверьте номер и если он введен верно, то нажмите далее.
lng.notExist: Нет такого номера.

lng.cantCheckButCantNext: Numéro incorrect. Vérifiez qu'il est saisit correctement et cliquez sur suivant
lng.checking: Les données sont en cours de vérification
lng.notExist: Numéro inexistant

lng.AmountLessMinValue: Le montant inscrit, y compris la commission, est inférieur au montant du paiement minimum ({Payment.Service.MinValue}). Veuillez entrer un montant différent.
